**"Life is a Highway" by Tom Cochrane**: This song embodies the adventurous spirit of life's journey. It could represent moments of excitement, growth, and exploration in your life, from starting a new job to embarking on a trip around the world.

**"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey**: With its powerful chorus and inspirational lyrics, this song could be a reminder to keep striving for your dreams, no matter how challenging the road ahead may seem. It's perfect for those moments when you need a boost of motivation or encouragement.

**"Imagine" by John Lennon**: This iconic song promotes peace, unity, and global harmony. It can serve as a theme for all the times you strive for understanding, compassion, and connection with others, aiming to make the world a better place.

**"Firework" by Katy Perry**: This upbeat track celebrates individuality and self-expression. It can be a personal anthem during times when you're embracing your unique qualities, standing up for what you believe in, or pursuing creative passions.

**"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles**: Known for its uplifting melody and hopeful lyrics, this song could be the perfect soundtrack for moments of joy, renewal, and overcoming adversity. It can remind you that even after dark times, there's always hope and light ahead.
